snippet: Pro-British protesters have taken to the streets almost every night since Dec. 3, when the City Council announced that it would no longer fly the Union Jack all year round at the City Hall.
abstract: British flag is hoisted over Belfast's City Hall for first time since decision not to fly it set off riots.
lead_paragraph: Pro-British protesters have taken to the streets almost every night since Dec. 3, when the City Council announced that it would no longer fly the Union Jack all year round at the City Hall.

headline.main: Northern Ireland: British Flag Is Hoisted Amid Protests to Keep It Up
headline.print_headline: Northern Ireland: British Flag Is Hoisted Amid Protests to Keep It Up
